gptSystemPrompt: You are an assistant that suggests life categories in a varied way. Generate a RANDOM CATEGORY related to important aspects of life (such as health, finances, studies, work, leisure, relationships, personal development, etc.). Return the response in JSON format, with double quotes on keys and values. Ensure that each response is unique and well-crafted. Correct response example: { "categoryName": "Finances", "description": "The management of money, investments, and financial planning to ensure personal economic security and growth." }

TutorialDescription: Learn the basics of BeYou in a quick walkthrough.
TutorialSpotlightProfileDescription: Here you can see your personal info, daily streak, and quick status.
TutorialSpotlightShortcutsDescription: Use these shortcuts to jump to categories, habits, tasks, routines, goals, and settings.
TutorialSpotlightCategoriesDescription: Categories are your first step. Click here to create one.
TutorialSpotlightCreateCategoryDescripti: Fill this form to create your first category. Create one to continue.
TutorialSpotlightCategoryListDescription: Great! Your new category shows up in this list, ready to organize habits and tasks.
TutorialCategoriesDescription: Categories are the foundation of your productivity system. They organize habits, tasks, routines, and goals.
TutorialCategoriesTip: Think about the main areas of your life: health, work, relationships, learning, etc.
TutorialHabitsDescription: Habits are recurring actions you want to build. Link them to categories to stay organized and track consistency.
TutorialHabitsTip: Start small! It's better to track 3 habits consistently than 10 habits inconsistently.
TutorialTasksDescription: Tasks are single actions that need to be done. Perfect for to-dos, appointments, or one-time activities.
TutorialTasksTip: Tasks can also be linked to categories to keep everything organized.
TutorialRoutinesDescription: Routines combine habits and tasks into timed schedules. Create morning, work, or evening routines to structure your day.
TutorialRoutinesTip: Routines run on specific days. Set them up once and follow them daily!
TutorialGoalsDescription: Goals give direction to your habits and tasks. Track progress and stay motivated over time.
TutorialGoalsTip: Break big goals into small habits so you can win every day.
Add this category in a habit, task or go: Add this category in a habit, task or goal!
Stay on track with your daily sections a: Stay on track with your daily sections and checks
ConstanceDescription: Choose how your streak should grow. Count any finished task or only when a full routine is done.
ConstanceOptionTaskDescription: Any individual task finished in a day increments your constance.
ConstanceOptionTaskDetail: Good for flexible days or smaller task lists.
ConstanceOptionRoutineDescription: Constance increases only after finishing all tasks in the scheduled routine.
ConstanceOptionRoutineDetail: Good for keeping a high bar but such a challenge.
SettingsSaveError: Error saving settings, please try again
No being used in any routine: No being used in any routine
ErrorLogout: Error trying to logout, please try again
